title: About Cannelle
paragraph1:
Led by Miranna Chou, Cannelle (the French word for 'cinnamon') is a micro-bakery dedicated to crafting baked goods that elevate everyday moments (a cup of coffee? Why not a cup of coffee and a warm cinnamon roll?).

Test

Using traditional techniques and a healthy dose of passion, we create products that are both sophisticated and comforting.
paragraph2: All our products are made by hand, using local flour from the Arva Flour Mill, so you know you are getting a top-quality and wholesome product.
